subject_newVehicles: [autobizTrade] - New cars are online, don't miss any opportunity !
body_newVehicles:
Hello,

Please find available new cars online at autobizTrade - make your offer now!

%{vehicles}

Feel free to contact our friendly and knowledgeable team if you have any questions.

If you no longer wish to receive this notification email, please send a message at trade-help@autobiz.com specifying your username

Best regards,

The autobizTrade team

https://trade.autobiz.com
subject_looserAuction: [autobizTrade] – You did not win the sale of  %{brandLabel} - %{modelLabel} - %{firstRegistrationDateYear}
body_looserAuction:
Hello,

Unfortunately, you were outbidded this time. A higher offer has been received for this car:

%{brandLabel} - %{modelLabel} - %{versionLabel} - %{mileage} KM in %{city}

Go to the listing

We wish you all the best for the next auction!

Feel free to contact our friendly and knowledgeable team if you have any questions.

If you no longer wish to receive this notification email, please send a message at trade-help@autobiz.com specifying your username

Best regards,

The autobizTrade team

https://trade.autobiz.com
subject_winnerAuction: [autobizTrade] – Congratulations, you have reserved the car: %{brandLabel} - %{modelLabel} - %{firstRegistrationDateYear}
body_winnerAuction:
Hello,

Congratulations, you have reserved the car:

%{brandLabel} - %{modelLabel} - %{versionLabel} - %{mileage} KM in %{city} (File number: %{fileNumber})

Go to the listing

Go to the appraisal report

You will find your offer details just below:

  • Date and time of your offer: %{offerCreatedAt}
  • Amount of the offer: %{offerAmount}€
  • File Number: %{fileNumber}

Information:

Payment

%{paymentDeadline}

Pickup

%{pickupDeadline}

Other

%{comments}


Please contact the dealer directly to finalize the sale. In case of a problem or if you have a question, please contact our friendly and knowledgeable team at support-autobiztrade@autobiz.com

If you no longer wish to receive this notification email, please send a message at trade-help@autobiz.com specifying your username

Best regards,

The autobizTrade team

https://trade.autobiz.com
subject_outbidding: [autobizTrade] - Attention you just lost the lead of the sale for this car :%{brandLabel} - %{modelLabel} - %{firstRegistrationDateYear}
body_outbidding:
Hello,

You are no longer the highest bidder for this car auction:

%{brandLabel} - %{modelLabel} - %{versionLabel} - %{mileage} KM in %{city}

Don't wait for outbidding here before the end of the sale.

Feel free to contact our friendly and knowledgeable team if you have any questions.

If you no longer wish to receive this notification email, please send a message at trade-help@autobiz.com specifying your username

Best regards,

The autobizTrade team

https://trade.autobiz.com

body_favoriteAuctionAboutToEnd:

subject_pendingVehicles: [autobizTrade] - [%{manualOrExpressSale}][%{groupName}] - A new vehicle is waiting fo your moderation :%{brandLabel} - %{modelLabel} - %{firstRegistrationDateYear}
body_pendingVehicles:
Hello,

A new vehicle is waiting for your moderation:

%{brandLabel} - %{modelLabel} - %{versionLabel} - %{mileage} stored at %{city}

and appraised by %{userFirstName} %{userLastName} (ID : %{userId}) (File Number : %{fileNumber})

Best regards,

The autobizTrade team

https://trade.autobiz.com
subject_newCoverageRequest: [autobizTrade] - Make a coverage offer for the following vehicle: %{brandLabel} - %{modelLabel} - %{firstRegistrationDateYear}
body_newCoverageRequest:
Hello,

Are you interested in this vehicle?

Make a coverage offer for :

%{brandLabel} - %{modelLabel} - %{versionLabel} - %{mileage} KM stock in %{POS_name} - %{POS_zipCode} - %{POS_city}

Click here to make a coverage offer

Feel free to contact our friendly and knowledgeable team if you have any questions.

If you no longer wish to receive this notification email, please send a message at trade-help@autobiz.com specifying your username

Best regards,

The autobizTrade team

https://trade.autobiz.com
subject_newOfferCoverageRequest: [autobizTrade] - A coverage offer was made for your vehicle: %{brandLabel} - %{modelLabel} - %{firstRegistrationDateYear}
body_newOfferCoverageRequest:
Hello,

%{firstname} %{lastname} made a coverage offer of %{OfferAmount} € for :

%{brandLabel} - %{modelLabel} - %{versionLabel} - %{mileage} KM stock in %{POS_name} - %{POS_zipCode} - %{POS_city} (File number: %{fileNumber})

Click here to access the Carcheck application to see the offer

In case of any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Best regards,

The autobizTrade team

https://trade.autobiz.com
body_winnerOfferToPrivate:
Hello,

Congratulations, your offer of %{offerAmount}€ for the car :

%{brandLabel} - %{modelLabel} - %{versionLabel} - %{mileage} KM stored in %{POS_name} - %{POS_zipCode} - %{POS_city} has been accepted !

You will find your offer details just below :

  • Date and time of your offer : %{offerCreatedAt}
  • Amount of the offer : %{offerAmount}€
  • Entry stock date: %{entryStockDate}
  • File Number: %{fileNumber}
  • Link of the ad

This confirmation is subject to the conditions of your partner %{POS_name}

Feel free to contact our friendly and knowledgeable team if you have any questions.

If you no longer wish to receive this notification email, please send a message at trade-help@autobiz.com specifying your username

Best regards,

The autobizTrade team

https://trade.autobiz.com.
